questions: Q. 1. What was the result of the peace negotiation in Geneva that followed the French defeat in Vietnam ?
answers: Ans. Vietnam is divided into two parts : North and South.

questions: Q. 2. Name the writer who wrote a play based on the lives of Trung sisters.
Q. 3. When did the war between Vietnam and the US officially end?
answers: Ans. In January 1974, in Paris, a peace settlement was signed.

questions: Q. 4. Who overthrew the Bao Dai government in the South Vietnam?
answers: Ans. A coup led by Ngo Dinh Diem of the United Opposition Parties called the National Liberation Front.

questions: Q. 5. At which place were the French outwitted by the Vietminh forces ?
Q. 6. By what name was the League for Independence later known ?
Q. 7. What does NLF stand for ?
Q. 8. What do you mean by Napalm ?
answers: Ans. A chemical bomb which destroys millions.
Ans. League for the Independence of Vietnam.
